modName: Run with 2-hand weapon in one hand
summary: The mod allows the player to carry a 2-handed weapon in one hand when running.
descriptionHtml:
I don\'t like the way the character runs with a 2-handed weapon.  It seems unnatural to me. So, I substituted the 1-hand weapon running animations for the 2-hand animations. I think it looks more realistic.

To install, extract the zipped Data flolder to your Skyrim directory.  To uninstall, delete the files you installed. (Note:  They are all in the data/meshes/actors/character/animations folder.)
author: Hex Eddie

files.name: Run with 2-hand weapon in one hand
